personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Enter your name, national ID, date of birth, and gender.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Mobile number, organizational email, and residential address.

job.title: Job Information
job.description: Position, contract type, start date, and location.

education.title: Educational Information
education.description: Degree, major, university, and graduation year.

workHistory.title: Work History
workHistory.description: Previous companies, positions, and work experiences.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Resume, national ID card, photo, and documents.

additional.title: Additional Information
additional.description: Skills, LinkedIn, GitHub, and other information.

prepareDocs.title: Prepare Documents
prepareDocs.value: National ID card, birth certificate, latest HR decree

uploadDocs.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocs.value: Document upload feature will be available soon.

hrSupport.title: HR Support
hrSupport.value: Contact the HR department if needed.
